content:
This chunk initializes a "Deselect All" command under the DIRECT menu in the application's interface.

self.menuBar.addmenuitem('DIRECT', 'command',
                                 'Deselect All',
                                 label = 'Deselect All',
                                 command = ShowBaseGlobal.direct.deselectAll)

        # Get a handle to the menu frame
        menuFrame = self.menuFrame
